entry.title: üé∑ Ibiza-Style DJ Sax Experience at Villa Alamanita (Sitges, Barcelona)
entry.summary: Performing at Villa Alamanita ‚Äî formerly known as Villa Catalina ‚Äî is always a privilege. Nestled among vineyards, Mediterranean forests, and the golden light of Sitges, this iconic venue near Barcelona is the perfect setting for a luxury destination wedding. This time, I had the…
entry.content:
Performing at Villa Alamanita ‚Äî formerly known as Villa Catalina ‚Äî is always a privilege. Nestled among vineyards, Mediterranean forests, and the golden light of Sitges, this iconic venue near Barcelona is the perfect setting for a luxury destination wedding. This time, I had the pleasure of performing during the cocktail hour in my Solo DJ Sax format, bringing an elegant yet vibrant Ibiza-inspired atmosphere to the celebration.

The guests arrived to the smooth and uplifting sound of ‚ÄúFeeling Good‚Äù by Michael Bubl√©, performed live on saxophone as a warm and stylish welcome. From there, I built the ambience with Balearic grooves, deep house, and Mediterranean chill, all mixed live while improvising on the sax.

Being completely wireless allows me to move freely among the guests, creating an immersive and intimate experience ‚Äî one of the key advantages of hiring a roaming saxophonist for weddings and corporate events.

üí´ An Effortless, Stylish Celebration Thanks to Premi√®re Plume

This beautiful day was orchestrated by Farah from Premi√®re Plume, whose impeccable planning ensured that everything flowed naturally and flawlessly. The timing, the energy, and the transitions were perfect ‚Äî allowing each moment to breathe and shine.

Villa Alamanita is a venue that truly elevates every experience: elegant architecture, serene nature, and a layout that‚Äôs ideal for luxury destination weddings in Sitges and the Barcelona area. It‚Äôs the kind of place where music, people, and atmosphere blend into something unforgettable.

üéâ Party Time with DJ Bernat ‚Äì Feel Good Music

When the sun set and the party began, I joined DJ Bernat (Feel Good Music) for a high-energy, feel-good party set.
From Avicii and David Guetta to disco classics and uplifting anthems, the dance floor came alive. With the combination of his DJ skills and my live saxophone improvisations, we created an explosive and modern party experience ‚Äî one perfectly suited for international couples seeking premium entertainment.

Whether during the cocktail, dinner entrance or the late-night party, the DJ + Sax fusion brings excitement, elegance and a unique personal touch that guests remember long after the wedding.

üé∑ Available for Luxury Weddings & Events in Spain and Across Europe

Born and raised in Barcelona, I perform regularly in Sitges, Costa Brava, Mallorca, Ibiza, Marbella, Madrid, and the South of France, offering tailored music experiences for destination weddings, premium private events and corporate celebrations.

entry.content:
Performing at Castell d‚ÄôEmpord√†, one of the most beautiful wedding venues on the Costa Brava, is always an extraordinary experience. Surrounded by the timeless charm of this historic castle and the golden Mediterranean light, every performance here feels unique and filled with emotion.

For this wedding‚Äôs aperitif, I performed in a solo format, blending¬† live saxophone with chillout and modern house music ‚Äî all mixed live by myself. This approach allows me to adapt the rhythm and energy in real time, creating a smooth and elegant atmosphere that evolves naturally with the guests‚Äô mood.

As the cocktails begin and laughter fills the air, the music becomes the heartbeat of the moment ‚Äî relaxed yet vibrant, setting the perfect tone for a luxury Mediterranean wedding celebration.

üí´ The Perfect Transition to an Unforgettable Celebration

Whether for the aperitif or for an epic entrance to the banquet, the live saxophone show adds emotion and excitement to your wedding day.
Many couples choose to start the aperitif with a spectacular entrance ‚Äî stepping into the terrace with music, energy and applause ‚Äî turning that first appearance as newlyweds into something truly cinematic.

Later in the day, the sax can take on a different role: an uplifting and energetic performance that bridges the transition from dinner to the dance floor, combining live improvisation with the DJ‚Äôs beats for an unforgettable party.

üìç Available for Weddings & Events Across Spain and Europe

I'originally from Barcelona, I perform regularly across Costa Brava, Mallorca, Ibiza, Marbella, and the South of France, offering music for destination weddings and luxury events.

The SAXONARA live experience brings together elegance, energy, and exclusivity ‚Äî a perfect fit for couples seeking a modern yet timeless soundtrack for their celebration.

entry.title: üì∏ DJSAX Live Meets La Boscana: Luxury Wedding Vibe in Lleida

entry.content:
This week, we are thrilled to share a glimpse behind the scenes from a spectacular destination wedding at La Boscana in Lleida. These incredible photos, captured by the brilliant team at Pi√±a Colada Weddings, truly showcase the magic we created together!

La Boscana: The Perfect Oasis for Luxury Weddings

La Boscana is not just a venue; it‚Äôs a breathtaking luxury estate in Lleida, offering an absolutely unique setting for weddings. Surrounded by stunning gardens, exclusive spaces, and renowned for its excellent gastronomy (led by Michelin-starred chef Joel Casta√±√©), it is easily one of the top wedding venues in Lleida and the whole of Catalonia.

The blend of natural beauty and five-star service makes it the ideal backdrop for a memorable celebration.

The Synergy: Saxophone, Energy, and Pi√±a Colada Weddings

Working alongside the talented photographers and videographers from Pi√±a Colada Weddings is always a highlight. Their style‚Äîvibrant, dynamic, and focused on capturing genuine moments‚Äîis the perfect match for the high-energy DJSAX Live Show.

They excel at crafting compelling visual stories, making them an essential choice for any destination wedding photographer in Spain or Barcelona. If you want a team that captures the vibe, not just the scene, they are the ones to call.

Elevate Your Wedding: Hire a Saxophonist in Lleida

As a professional wedding saxophonist, my role at La Boscana was to soundtrack the elegance of the setting and the joy of the party:

  • üé∑ Cocktail Hour: Setting a sophisticated atmosphere with chilled Deep House and Latin grooves.

  • üéâ Fiesta: Cranking up the dance floor with the DJ & Sax Show, featuring LED lighting saxophone and live improvisation, ensuring the night ends on an electrifying high note.

If you are planning your wedding at one of the exquisite fincas de boda en Lleida (wedding estates in Lleida) or anywhere in Catalunya, booking a saxophonist for weddings like SAXONARA guarantees the high-impact entertainment your party deserves.

entry.content:
Few moments are as powerful during a wedding as the entrance of the bride and groom ‚Äî that instant when all eyes turn to celebrate their arrival with music, energy and emotion.

At Finca Els Arquells, near Agramunt (Lleida, Catalonia), I had the pleasure of performing live saxophone alongside the DJ for an incredible couple who chose to make their entrance truly unforgettable. The chosen song was ‚ÄúTu Sei‚Äù by Gabry Ponte, an explosive electronic anthem that filled the space with light, sound and celebration ‚Äî enhanced by the magic of sparklers and cheers from their guests.

The combination of live sax and DJ brought the track to life, creating a moment of pure excitement and connection. This kind of spectacular wedding entrance transforms what could be a simple arrival into a cinematic highlight that everyone remembers.

üí´ Create an Unforgettable Moment

This format isn‚Äôt just for the banquet entrance ‚Äî it also works beautifully for the cocktail hour or the opening of the party, setting the tone for a lively, elegant and emotional celebration.

With the DJ SAX show by SAXONARA, you can combine modern electronic music with live saxophone energy, adapting to every stage of your event:

  • üéµ Elegant & smooth for cocktail or aperitif

  • ‚ö° Explosive & energetic for party moments
  • üåü Fully customized song selection for your entrance

üìç Available for Weddings Across Spain & Europe

Based in Barcelona, I perform regularly across Catalonia, Mallorca, Ibiza, Marbella, and other top wedding destinations in Spain, France and Italy.
Whether it‚Äôs an intimate celebration or a large destination wedding, my goal is always to bring that unique mix of luxury, music and emotion that defines the SAXONARA experience.

entry.content:
Forget the postcards. We just took the iconic Ibiza sunset experience and cranked the volume to eleven. Last month, we had the immense privilege of joining the undisputed queen of Progressive House, Miss Monique, for an unforgettable live set right in front of the mystical Es Vedr√†.

The Magic Happened: Saxophone Meets Progressive House at the Island's Edge

If you've ever wondered what happens when the soulful energy of live saxophone meets Miss Monique‚Äôs hypnotic beats, the result is pure, unadulterated musical electricity. The fusion of her expertly curated electronic landscape and the raw, improvised power of the sax created a sonic moment that defines the global dance floor.

This isn't just background noise; this is Live Music transforming a DJ set into a full-scale sensory experience‚Äîproving that the DJ and Saxophone combo is the most potent format for moving a crowd.

The Power of the DJ & Sax Combo

The synergy of DJSAX Live is what sets a good party apart from a legendary one. Whether we‚Äôre bringing that energy to:

  • The biggest clubs and festivals

  • Exclusive private parties
  • High-profile corporate events
  • Luxury weddings

...the mix of electronic precision and human musicality creates an interaction that‚Äôs simply unmatched.

Ready to Book the Es Vedr√† Vibe?

Are you looking to inject this level of show-stopping energy into your next high-end event?

As a Saxophonist for events, SAXONARA specializes in delivering this premium DJSAX experience globally. We are available for hire to elevate your celebration, bringing the electric atmosphere of Ibiza wherever you are.

We are frequently booked across Europe and beyond, including major hubs for luxury events:

Don't settle for just music; book the show that guests will talk about for years.

entry.title: üé∂ Violin & Sax Fusion at Domaine Le Castelet ‚Äì Destination Wedding in the South of France
entry.summary: Performing at Domaine Le Castelet, near Castres in the South of France, was an unforgettable experience. This beautiful destination wedding brought together guests from all over the world ‚Äî including the bride and groom who had travelled all the way from Australia to celebrate their…
entry.content:
Performing at Domaine Le Castelet, near Castres in the South of France, was an unforgettable experience. This beautiful destination wedding brought together guests from all over the world ‚Äî including the bride and groom who had travelled all the way from Australia to celebrate their love in one of the most charming venues of Occitanie.

For the ceremony, we created an elegant and emotional atmosphere with our Violin & Guitar Duo, performing romantic songs chosen by the couple ‚Äî blending classical warmth with a modern acoustic touch.

As the sun began to set, we transitioned into a vibrant DJ SAX & Violin set for the cocktail reception, turning the moment into a chic Ibiza-style uplifting house experience. The live energy of saxophone and violin fused perfectly with deep beats, creating a sophisticated yet festive vibe that kept guests smiling, dancing and celebrating throughout the evening.

üåø Why choose live music for your destination wedding in France?

Live musicians add emotion, connection and exclusivity to every moment of your day.
Whether it‚Äôs a violin for the ceremony, a saxophonist for the cocktail hour, or an energetic DJ SAX duo for the party, each element enhances the atmosphere and makes your wedding truly unique.

Couples from abroad ‚Äî especially from Australia, the UK, and the US ‚Äî often choose the South of France for its timeless elegance, charming ch√¢teaux and Mediterranean light. Venues such as Domaine Le Castelet, Ch√¢teau de Pennautier, or Ch√¢teau de Cassis are ideal for this kind of sophisticated celebration.

üìç Available for Weddings & Events Across France

I'm a saxophonist based in Barcelona, I regularly perform across Toulouse, Perpignan, Marseille and even Paris, offering live saxophone, violin collaborations and DJ SAX performances for weddings and corporate events.

If you‚Äôre looking for live wedding musicians in the South of France who can blend elegance, modernity and vibrant energy, the Violin & Sax Fusion by SAXONARA is the perfect match.

This unique concept perfectly suits luxury corporate events, exclusive rooftop parties, and sophisticated wedding receptions where guests expect both refinement and rhythm.

üìç Available Across Europe

entry.content:
Check out our new video for a Destination Event with SAXONARA playing a DJ & Saxophone performance at the historic Mas Solers estate, a premier event venue located just 45 minutes from Barcelona. The high-energy event was commissioned by a leading firm in the veterinary sector, with full production management handled by the esteemed London-based agency, Delicious Agency.

The performance was meticulously designed for maximum visual and auditory impact. We began the show on the main stage before executing a surprise relocation: dramatically appearing on the venue's central balcony to join the DJ, turning the architectural space into a dynamic, multi-level stage. This unique Saxophone Show captivated guests and reinforced SAXONARA's reputation for delivering unforgettable Corporate Event Entertainment.

Strategic Importance for Event Bookings

This successful collaboration underscores the seamless connection between the Barcelona and London event markets. As a sought-after Saxophonist for Hire in Barcelona and London, SAXONARA frequently travels between these major European hubs, both of which are critical locations for Luxury Event Planning and Destination Weddings.

"Barcelona continues to attract world-class events, and the ability to offer a unique performance style that integrates seamlessly with top UK agencies like Delicious Agency is key," says Arnald Pedr√≥s.

SAXONARA specializes in Destination Events and Destination Weddings, regularly travelling from both his base near Barcelona and major departure points like London to perform at exclusive locations across Europe and the world. Whether clients are searching for a Wedding Saxophonist in Spain or an impactful Corporate DJ & Sax Show in the UK, SAXONARA offers a professional, high-energy solution tailored for international audiences.

The collaboration with the London-based Delicious Agency highlights SAXONARA's readiness to integrate into international production teams, making the booking process smooth for Event Planners in London securing entertainment for European Events.

entry.title: A Touch of Sax for a Corporate Event in Benic√†ssim
entry.summary: I recently had the pleasure of performing at a corporate dinner for a German company's incentive trip in Benic√†ssim, Valencia. The venue, El Invernadero by Grupo Capic√∫a, provided the perfect setting for a professional yet relaxed event. I traveled by car to the location, which…
entry.content:
I recently had the pleasure of performing at a corporate dinner for a German company's incentive trip in Benic√†ssim, Valencia. The venue, El Invernadero by Grupo Capic√∫a, provided the perfect setting for a professional yet relaxed event. I traveled by car to the location, which is a fantastic venue for events of this kind.

My performance was designed to match the event's atmosphere perfectly. I brought my live saxophone to the dinner, playing a unique blend of jazz and electronic music. The style was a cool mix of cocktail-lounge at the beginning and chill-out during the dinner, creating an atmosphere that was both elegant and modern. The live music added a fresh and dynamic touch that truly elevated the experience for the guests.

My passion is to bring this unique musical experience to events across Europe. Whether you‚Äôre planning a corporate dinner in Valencia or Barcelona, a wedding in Paris, a private party in London, or a special event in Madrid or Milan, I am available to travel and provide an unforgettable live music experience for you and your clients.

If you're looking to hire a saxophonist to elevate your next corporate event or private party, feel free to get in touch. Let's create something special together.
